request_pathways.name: Authorization for Release of CrescentCare Medical Information (English)
Autorización Para la Divulgación de Información Médica (Spanish)

access_pathway.primary_pathway_description: Patient can use a dedicated online records request page or download a generic authorization form that prominently features a self-access option with electronic delivery choices.

bright_spots: Bilingual forms (English and Spanish) with identical structure
Electronic delivery options for self-requests: Patient Portal and Encrypted Email
Dedicated online records request page as a digital-first alternative
Self-access option placed first on the form, before third-party release
Single-page design covers all necessary elements efficiently

findability.rationale: Level 5: Prominently available on the Patient Resources page, discoverable via basic web search, and a dedicated 'Request your medical records' page exists — minimal effort required.

technical_accessibility.rationale: Level 4: Mostly digital — the org offers an online records request page for fully digital submission, but the downloadable PDF has zero fillable fields, requiring print and handwrite for that pathway.

content_design.rationale: Level 4: Well-organized single-page form with clear section headers, plain language, and logical flow; minor issues include missing submission instructions and slightly confusing expiration language.

patient_centeredness.rationale: Level 4: Patient access is clearly accommodated with the 'Myself via' option placed first and electronic delivery choices, even though the form also serves third-party release purposes.

compliance.rationale: Level 4: Includes no-conditioning statement, revocation rights, and re-disclosure warning with no unnecessary barriers; minor ambiguities include requiring a 'signed letter' for revocation and no fee or timeline disclosure.

overall.summary: CrescentCare provides a well-designed bilingual authorization form with clear patient self-access options and an online records request alternative, earning a strong B despite non-fillable PDFs and missing submission instructions.
